comment._content: www.ironmind.com/ironmind/opencms/ironmind/resources/olym... “The German Meteor: Hermann Gassler A brilliant Greco-Roman wrestler turned weightlifter, Gassler held two world records at the same time for the same lift—one in Paris and one in Germany. "

comment.author: 66259651@N02
comment._content: Do you know any information about The German Meteor: Hermann Gassler? Did he ever make his way to the US?
